l2transport.connect.distribute: Connects to multiple targets. When receiving content, iterate through all targets until finding one valid target. Only send to 1 target, and start from the next one next time.
l2transport.connect.extended: Connects to only one target. This node acts as a shadow reference of the target's side, allowing all interfacing through that side of the target block.
l2transport.connect.invalid: This node is connected to one or more invalid target. To remove unused connections, use validator wand to clear them.
l2transport.connect.ordered: Connects to multiple targets with different distance. Cannot connect to targets with the same distance. When receiving content, iterate through all targets in order of distance until all contents transferred.
l2transport.connect.receive: Connects to only one target. Actively extracts content from attached block. When applying filter, it will only extract the amount the filter specified. It also acts as a simple node.
l2transport.connect.simple: Connects to only one target. When adding filter, only allow content matching filter to pass, and gate content amount to the filter amount.
l2transport.connect.synced: Connects to multiple targets. When receiving content, attempt to send the same amount to all target, and otherwise send no content. Send 1 by default, and when applying filter, send the same amount as the filter amount.
l2transport.screen.blacklist: Using blacklist. Click to switch to whitelist.
l2transport.screen.match_item: Match item only. Click to match NBT.
l2transport.screen.match_tag: Match item and NBT. Click to match item only.
l2transport.screen.unlock: Unlocked. Click to lock filter outside of GUI.
l2transport.screen.whitelist: Using whitelist. Click to switch to blacklist.
l2transport.upgrade.watch: Emit redstone signal when transfer succeed
l2transport.wand.clear: Right click a node to clear all links. Shift-Right click a node to clear all upgrades.
l2transport.wand.config: Press direction keys or scroll to alter transfer limit. Right click node to open advanced filter config menu. Press Shift or Alt to disable so that you can use the item selector overlay.
l2transport.wand.link: Right click a node to start linking. Right click another block to link. Right click the node itself to halt. Right click an already linked node to unlink.
l2transport.wand.rotate: Right click a block to rotate. Works similar to debug stick.
l2transport.wand.validate: Right click a node to remove all invalid links.
